title: cmd/godoc: paths broken
body:
by **bgarcia@golang.org**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
   build & run local godoc:
   godoc -http=:8888

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

  Package paths should look like:
  http://localhost:8888/pkg/time

  Instead, there's an extra "pkg" in there:
  http://localhost:8888/pkg/pkg/time

  And clicking on a link from the package documentation to view the source code results in a broken path:
  http://localhost:8888/src/pkg/time
